tool_description: Calculates optimal protein, fat, and carbohydrate ratios based on species requirements, life stage, and health conditions.
error_messages: Invalid species: Species must be supported for macronutrient calculations
Invalid calorie amount: Daily calories must be positive number
Invalid life stage: Life stage must be recognized category
Invalid activity level: Activity level must be valid classification
usage: Provide species, daily_calories, life_stage, and activity_level. Optionally include health_conditions for customized macronutrient ratios.

protein_percentage.description: Protein as percentage of total calories

fat_percentage.description: Fat as percentage of total calories

carbohydrate_percentage.description: Carbohydrates as percentage of total calories
